tasks.title: Search X (last 24 hours) for the specified energy/battery/media handles to collect recent posts on energy production, smart grid, storage, and batteries.

Draft proposed entries to add to the knowledge graph (Capabilities, Milestones, Trends, Parties/PTCs/LTCs) without creating them yet.
Fact-check each candidate item with primary sources on the open web and extract dates/metrics.
Prepare concise, cited bullet points to confirm whatâ€™s verified today (Aug 16, 2025).
Create or update graph entries: Capabilities, Milestones (with dates), and Parties; then link them to existing EmTechs via ENABLES / HAS_MILESTONE and to Parties via MAKES/PROVIDES where appropriate.
Report what was added with references.
